attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the PM to end the licence fee when the country goes digital.
Why should we pay for a collection of channels that can be blocked when the analogue signal is switched off? 
As and when the country goes digital we should have the choice of paying for these channels.
Would you pay £135 for a similar package on satelite or cable???
Switch off the licence fee when we switch off the signal.
